## Prefixed type

Construct a type by adding to the all string keys of `TProps` the prefix specified by `TPrefix` (string literal)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Prefixed<TProps, TPrefix> = {
    [TKey in keyof TProps as PrefixedKey<TKey, TPrefix>]: TProps[TKey];
};
```
**References:** [PrefixedKey](./use-prefixed-props.prefixedkey.md)

## Example


```ts
 type Props = { foo: unknown, bar: unknown }

 type BazProps = Prefixed<Props, "baz">
 // { "baz-foo": unknown, "baz-bar": unknown }
```
